name: Rezimac® 62-6260
description: Rezimac® 62-6260 is a silicone modified, soya-based alkyd exhibiting excellent color and gloss retention that lengthens time to repaint. Enamels formulated with this resin meet the requirements of specifications TT-E-490E and TT-E-1593B. Manufactured in North America. All components of this product are listed on the DSL.
